attributes.action: Object the Proposal for a massive Rail Port to be build on the edge of Bearsted, Kent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kent International Gateway have put fowards plans to build a massive rail port distribution centre on the edge of Bearsted.  The land is currently farmland and an area of outstanding natural beauty and the build would be 1.5 miles long with 382000 square metres of warehouse units. It would effect the whole charater of Bearsted, Local Environment, Traffic levels and noise. These destructive plans Must be stopped!
